AdWatch Rewards – Earn Points by Watching Ads!

 💰 Watch Ads and Earn Rewards! 💰
 AdWatch Rewards is a fun and easy way to earn points by watching video ads.
 Simply watch ads, collect points, and redeem them for real rewards!


✨ How It Works?
 1️⃣ Watch Ads – Earn points by watching video ads.
 2️⃣ Ad Limits and Gaps –
 🔹 Minimum 5-second gap between ads.
 🔹 Maximum 50 ads per day.
 3️⃣ Earn Points –
 🔹 30-sec ad = 0.001 points.
 4️⃣ Redeem Rewards –
 🔹 Minimum 1$ required to redeem.
 5️⃣ Payout Time –
 🔹 Withdrawals take a minimum of 4-7 Working days to process and be credited.
 6️⃣ Safe and Secure – Fraud prevention measures are in place.


🎯 Why Choose AdWatch Rewards?
 ✅ No hidden conditions – simple and transparent rewards.
 ✅ Easy tracking – see your daily ads watched and points earned.
 ✅ Fast redemptions – payouts processed in just 7 days.
 ✅ Engaging community – ask questions, interact, and learn!


📜 Community Guidelines
 ✔️ Respect others – No hate speech, harassment, or spamming.
 ✔️ No fraudulent activity – Fake ad views or multiple accounts = Suspension.
 ✔️ Follow Play Store policies – Content must be appropriate.
 ✔️ Report issues – Use the flagging system.


📩 Contact Us
 📧 Support Email: yvvnandak@example.com
 🌐 Website: www.example.com
 📌 Follow us for updates!


⚠️ Important Notice
 🚨 This app does not offer real money directly. Rewards are converted based on points.
 Withdrawals take a minimum of 7 days.
 Fraudulent activities = Account suspension.
